title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 
of State at the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department housing local government heritage) order

title: of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997), hereby order as
heading: 2. Hannah Hamilton, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Hannah Hamilton, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, is 
appointed as Special Adviser to Malcolm Noonan, Minister of State at the 
Department of Housing, Local Government and Heritage, with effect from 11 
January 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

26 January, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [38] 3
